metadata.title: CVE-2024-45341 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A certificate with a URI which has a IPv6 address with a zone ID mayincorrectly satisfy a URI name constraint that applies to the certificatechain. Certificates containing URIs are not permitted in the web PKI, sothis only affects users of private PKIs which make use of URIs.

criterions.comment: golang-1.21 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.22 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
golang-go.crypto package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
snapd package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
